wikipedia_page.main:
Geraint Wyn Todd (born 8 August 1979) is a Welsh actor, originally from Pontypridd in the South Wales Valleys. He has played several major roles in Welsh dramas and comedies, most notably in Cowbois ac Injans (2006-2007), Gwaith/Cartref (2011-2012) and Pobol y Cwm (2011-2019)
Played the councillor in BBC series The Pact
